HDFS configuration files You can use the following HDFS configuration files with the MapR FS destination:
To use HDFS configuration files:
Store the files or a symlink to the files in the resources directory.
In the MapR FS destination, specify the location of the files.
Individual properties You can configure individual HDFS properties in the destination. To add an HDFS property, you specify the exact property name and the value. The MapR FS destination does not validate the property names or values.Individual properties override properties defined in the HDFS configuration file.
